column7: David Attenborough returns with a new wildlife documentary that shows life in a variety of habitats.
A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.
Emmy Award-winning, 11 episodes, five years in the making, the most expensive nature documentary series ever commissioned by the BBC, and the first to be filmed in high definition.
The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord to V-J Day.
In April 1986, an explosion at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics becomes one of the world's worst man-made catastrophes.
The Baltimore drug scene, as seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.

David Attenborough returns to the world's oceans in this sequel to the acclaimed documentary filming rare and unusual creatures of the deep, as well as documenting the problems our oceans fa... Read all
In a war-torn world of elemental magic, a young boy reawakens to undertake a dangerous mystic quest to fulfill his destiny as the Avatar, and bring peace to the world.
An exploration of our discovery of the laws of nature and coordinates in space and time.

New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life that affect his mental state, leading him to seek professional psychiatric counseli... Read all
Astronomer Carl Sagan leads us on an engaging guided tour of the various elements and cosmological theories of the universe.

Documentary series focusing on the breadth of the diversity of habitats around the world, from the remote Arctic wilderness and mysterious deep oceans to the vast landscapes of Africa and di... Read all
Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.
An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson.
A groundbreaking 26-part documentary series narrated by the actor Laurence Olivier about the deadliest conflict in history, World War II.
Two brothers search for a Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their deceased mother goes awry and leaves them in damaged physical forms.
Charting the rise of the 1990s Chicago Bulls, led by Michael Jordan, one of the most notable dynasties in sports history.

David Attenborough 's legendary BBC crew explains and shows wildlife all over planet earth in 10 episodes. The first is an overview of the challenges facing life, the others are dedicated to... Read all
A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st-century London.
Ordinary people find themselves in extraordinarily astounding situations, which they each try to solve in a remarkable manner.
A comprehensive history of the United States' involvement in the bitterly divisive armed conflict in Southeast Asia.
The Dark Knight battles crime in Gotham City with occasional help from Robin and Batgirl.
Set in 1980s and '90s Bombay, it follows the life of Harshad Mehta, a stockbroker who took the stock market to dizzying heights and his catastrophic downfall.
Set in utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League champions-and the power that will tear them apart.
Mammoth series, five years in the making, taking a look at the rich tapestry of life in the world's oceans.

Five hundred years in the future, a renegade crew aboard a small spacecraft tries to survive as they travel the unknown parts of the galaxy and evade warring factions as well as authority ag... Read all
A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.
After his hometown is destroyed and his mother is killed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

Like all life forms, humanity partially adapts to types of natural environment, yet also tends to change them. Each episode examines how life differs for men and nature in some type of envir... Read all
Focuses on life and the environment in both the Arctic and Antarctic.
An intelligent high school student goes on a secret crusade to eliminate criminals from the world after discovering a notebook capable of killing anyone whose name is written into it.
Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.
Documentary about the music group The Beatles featuring in-studio footage that was shot in early 1969 for the 1970 feature film 'Let It Be.'
Comedy that follows two brothers from London's rough Peckham estate as they wheel and deal through a number of dodgy deals and search for the big score that'll make them millionaires.
A comprehensive survey of the American Civil War.
The continuing misadventures of neurotic New York City stand-up comedian Jerry Seinfeld and his equally neurotic New York City friends.
Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter, an exceptional being capable of greatness. With his friends and his potential, he seeks out his father, who left him when he was younger.
A man diagnosed with Alzheimer's decides to punish criminals.
Follow Jeremy Clarkson as he attempts to run a farm in the countryside.
Various chronicles of deception, intrigue and murder in and around frozen Minnesota. Yet all of these tales mysteriously lead back one way or another to Fargo, North Dakota.
Ten television drama films, each one based on one of the Ten Commandments.
The futuristic misadventures and tragedies of an easygoing bounty hunter and his partners.
Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.
Five teens from Harlem become trapped in a nightmare when they're falsely accused of a brutal attack in Central Park. Based on the true story.
Twin siblings Dipper and Mabel Pines spend the summer at their great-uncle's tourist trap in the enigmatic Gravity Falls, Oregon.

column2: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver
column7: Former Daily Show host and correspondent John Oliver brings his persona to this weekly news satire program.

Nathan Fielder uses his business degree and life experiences to help real small businesses turn a profit. But because of his unorthodox approach, Nathan's genuine efforts to do good often dr... Read all

Africa, the world's wildest continent. David Attenborough takes us on an awe-inspiring journey through one of the most diverse places in the world. We visit deserts, savannas, and jungles an... Read all
The original surreal sketch comedy showcase for the Monty Python troupe.
A story of trials and tribulations of four young entrepreneurs who quit their day jobs in order to pursue their start up venture.

Apocalypse: The Second World War(2009) is a six-part French documentary about the Second World War. The documentary is composed exclusively of actual footage of the war as filmed by war corr... Read all
Five friends with big egos and small brains are the proprietors of an Irish pub in Philadelphia.
The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer Jimmy McGill in the time before he established his strip-mall law office in Albuquerque, New Mexico as Saul Goodman.
A World War II German U-Boat crew have a terrifying patrol mission in the early days of the war.
Five comedians are set tasks challenging their creativity and wit. The tasks are supervised by Alex Horne but the Taskmaster, Greg Davies, always has the final word.
The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.
While the arrival of wealthy gentlemen sends her marriage-minded mother into a frenzy, willful and opinionated Elizabeth Bennet matches wits with haughty Mr. Darcy.
Hotel owner Basil Fawlty's incompetence, short fuse, and arrogance form a combination that ensures accidents and trouble are never far away.
A high school mathlete starts hanging out with a group of burnouts while her younger brother navigates his freshman year.
Inside the lives of staffers in the West Wing of the White House.
Turkish television comedy series set in Istanbul, Leyla and Mecnun is a surreal and absurd comedy that revolves around the fictional love story between Leyla and Mecnun.
Stuck in the middle of World War I, Captain Edmund Blackadder does his best to escape the banality of the war.
An idiosyncratic FBI agent investigates the murder of a young woman in the even more idiosyncratic town of Twin Peaks.
An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.
A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar, as well as the many other drug kingpins who plagued the country through the years.
Comedian Dave Chappelle hosts this sketch-comedy show that parodies many of the nuances of race and culture.

With the help of the powerful Dragonballs, a team of fighters led by the saiyan warrior Goku defend the planet earth from extraterrestrial enemies.

The adventures of Earth's martial arts defender Son Goku continue with a new family and the revelation of his alien origin. Now Goku and his allies must defend the planet from an onslaught o... Read all
The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.
A gangster family epic set in 1900s England, centering on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps, and their fierce boss Tommy Shelby.
The history of the Roman Empire as experienced by one of its rulers.
A down-to-earth account of the lives of both illustrious and ordinary Romans set in the last days of the Roman Republic.
Follows the misadventures of four irreverent grade-schoolers in the quiet, dysfunctional town of South Park, Colorado.
A series chronicling the daily activities of an unusual prison facility and its criminal inhabitants.
American college football coach Ted Lasso heads to London to manage AFC Richmond, a struggling English Premier League football team.
A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.
Two brothers find themselves lost in a mysterious land and try to find their way home.

Follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in order to find the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger. The famous mystery treasure named "One Pie... Read all
The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.
Level-headed son Michael Bluth takes over family affairs after his father is imprisoned. But the rest of his spoiled, dysfunctional family are making his job unbearable.
A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.

The story of Saitama, a hero that does it just for fun & can defeat his enemies with a single punch.
After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.
The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.
An antisocial maverick doctor who specializes in diagnostic medicine does whatever it takes to solve puzzling cases that come his way using his crack team of doctors and his wits.
Yilmaz and Ilkkan are two friends who are constantly fighting each other. Their greatest feature is always being able to do something that will turn their ordinary lives upside down.
Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command.
When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

When an old enemy, the Cylons, resurface and obliterate the 12 colonies, the crew of the aged Galactica protect a small civilian fleet - the last of humanity - as they journey toward the fab... Read all
A chronicle of the lives of the British aristocratic Crawley family and their servants in the early twentieth century.
A comedy series adapted from the award-winning play about a young woman trying to cope with life in London whilst coming to terms with a recent tragedy.
An adult animated series based on the Skybound/Image comic about a teenager whose father is the most powerful superhero on the planet.
A Congressman works with his equally conniving wife to exact revenge on the people who betrayed him.
A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper.
A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.
Thorfinn pursues a journey with his father's killer in order to take revenge and end his life in a duel as an honorable warrior and pay his father a homage.
After her husband leaves her, young mother of two Miriam "Midge" Maisel discovers that she has a talent for stand-up comedy. Could this be her calling?
Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the twentieth century.
Set almost 100 years after Captain Kirk's 5-year mission, a new generation of Starfleet officers set off in the U.S.S. Enterprise-D on its own mission to go where no one has gone before.
Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson solve the mysteries of copper beeches, a Greek interpreter, the Norwood builder, a resident patient, the red-headed league, and one final problem.
A drama that follows the lives of the Dillon Panthers, one of the nation's best high school football teams, and their head coach Eric Taylor.

Mark and Jez are a couple of twenty-something roommates who have nothing in common - except for the fact that their lives are anything but normal. Mayhem ensues as the pair strive to cope wi... Read all
Follows the Dutton family as they embark on a journey west.
The hosts talk about everything car-related. From new cars to how they're fueled, this show has it all.

The show revolves around the lives of the members of an Uber Wealthy - High Society Gujarati family of Cuffe Parade - South Bombay, whose daughter-in-law is from a middle class Delhi backgro... Read all

Follow Jeremy, Richard, and James, as they embark on an adventure across the globe, driving new and exciting automobiles from manufacturers all over the world.

Guts is a skilled swordsman who joins forces with a mercenary group named 'The Band of the Hawk', lead by the charismatic Griffith, and fights with them as they battle their way into the roy... Read all
Set in the corridors of power and spin, the Minister for Social Affairs is continually harassed by Number 10's policy enforcer and dependent on his not-so-reliable team of civil servants.

A continuation of the Justice League animated series finds the original members of the team joined in their battle against crime and evil by dozens of other heroes from the DC comics univers... Read all
Drama series following the investigations of AC-12, a controversial police anti-corruption unit.
A show set in the late 1800s, revolving around the characters of Deadwood, South Dakota; a town of deep corruption and crime.

He's smart. He's lovable. He's Dexter Morgan, America's favorite serial killer, who spends his days solving crimes and nights committing them. Golden Globe winner Michael C. Hall stars in th... Read all
Two F.B.I. Agents, Fox Mulder the believer and Dana Scully the skeptic, investigate the strange and unexplained, while hidden forces work to impede their efforts.

column2: The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst
column7: Filmmaker Andrew Jarecki examines the complicated life of reclusive real estate icon Robert Durst, the key suspect in a series of unsolved crimes.
The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.
Set in quaint by-lanes in the heart of India, Gullak is a collection of disarming and relatable tales of the Mishra family.

A heartwarming and emotional story about a unique set of triplets, their struggles and their wonderful parents.

A blind lawyer by day, vigilante by night. Matt Murdock fights the crime of New York as Daredevil.
Covert black ops and espionage take a back seat to zany personalities and relationships between secret agents and drones.
After being given a mysterious power to control others, an outcast prince becomes the masked leader of the rebellion against an all powerful empire

In the not-too-distant future Joel Robinson is held captive by Dr. Forrester and TV's Frank, forced to watch B-Grade movies on the Satellite of Love with the help of his robot friends: Cambo... Read all

Centered around a personally troubled, officially discredited police chief and his inharmonious police team in Ankara Police Force. Even though the show usually focuses on murders and other ... Read all
Determined to be like the volleyball championship's star player nicknamed "the small giant", Shoyo joins his school's volleyball club.
In the Regency era, Mr E. Blackadder serves as butler to the foppish numskull Prince George amidst the fads and crazes of the time.
Teenage superheroes strive to prove themselves as members of the Justice League.

Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.
A 12-year-old boy and his best friend, wise 28-year-old dog with magical powers, go on a series of surreal adventures with each other in a remote future.
A ranching family in Montana faces off against others encroaching on their land.

A brilliant neurosurgeon finds his life in utter turmoil after getting involved with a psychopathic former patient.

The adventures of a young orphan girl living in the early 19th century. Follow Anne as she learns to navigate her new life on Prince Edward Island, in this new take on L.M. Montgomery's clas... Read all

At the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, waits a world in which every human appetite can be indulged without consequence.

U.S. Marshal Raylan Givens is reassigned from Miami to his childhood home in the poor, rural coal mining towns of eastern Kentucky.
TV series featuring the classic Looney Tunes animated shorts.

Docuseries following the FIA Formula One World Championship across multiple seasons.

A newsroom undergoes some changes in its workings and morals as a new team is brought in, bringing unexpected results for its existing news anchor.
Set in the summer of 1998 it is a story about conflicting emotions towards family members from the eyes of a twelve year old.

Q, Sal, Joe and Murr are real-life best friends who love challenging each other to the most outrageous dares and stunts ever caught on hidden camera.
A caveman and a dinosaur bond over shared tragedy and work together to survive in a perilous prehistoric world.
Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.
Six best friends talk about all aspects of sex and relationships on their never-ending quest to find true love.

The absolute top secret love story of a chaebol heiress who made an emergency landing in North Korea because of a paragliding accident and a North Korean special officer who falls in love wi... Read all

The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

This documentary series follows actors Ewan McGregor and Charley Boorman on a motorcycle trip around the world. The two friends will travel through such places as Siberia, Kazakhstan, Mongol... Read all
The comedic misadventures of Roy, Moss and their grifting supervisor Jen, a rag-tag team of IT support workers at a large corporation headed by a hotheaded yuppie.

A spy on an undercover mission gets married and adopts a child as part of his cover. His wife and daughter have secrets of their own, and all three must strive to keep together.
The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.
Fuu, a waitress who works in a teahouse, rescues two master swordsmen, Mugen and Jin, from their execution to help her find the "samurai who smells of sunflowers."

column2: What We Do in the Shadows
column7: A look into the daily (or rather, nightly) lives of four vampires, who've lived together for over 100 years, on Staten Island.

Elliot, a brilliant but highly unstable young cyber-security engineer and vigilante hacker, becomes a key figure in a complex game of global dominance when he and his shadowy allies try to t... Read all

A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.
Alan Partridge, a failed television presenter, is now presenting a programme on local radio in Norwich. He desperately tries to revive his broadcasting career.

Improvisational comedy competition show in which four members of the regular cast as comedians and often with guest appearances with other comedians and celebrities and members of the audien... Read all
A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.
James Hacker was propelled along the corridors of power to the very pinnacle of politics - Number 10.

Hosted by Morgan Freeman, Through the Wormhole will explore the deepest mysteries of existence - the questions that have puzzled mankind for eternity. What are we made of? What was there bef... Read all

Quick-witted, fast-paced snappy comedy about rural folk getting by in a small town.

A boy swallows a cursed talisman - the finger of a demon - and becomes cursed himself. He enters a shaman's school to be able to locate the demon's other body parts and thus exorcise himself... Read all

The life of Spartacus, the gladiator who lead a rebellion against the Romans. From his time as an ally of the Romans, to his betrayal and becoming a gladiator, to the rebellion he leads and ... Read all

When a failed alchemical ritual leaves brothers Edward and Alphonse Elric with severely damaged bodies, they begin searching for the one thing that can save them: the fabled philosopher's st... Read all
A samurai, sent through time, fights to return home and save the world.

The story of young teenagers and pupils on Hartvig Nissens upper secondary school in Oslo, and their troubles, scandals and everyday life. Each season is told from a different person's point... Read all
North and South is a four part adaptation of Elizabeth Gaskell's love story of Margaret Hale, a middle class southerner who is forced to move to the northern town of Milton.

In the time before the arrival of Spartacus, the House of Batiatus faces many challenges from competitors, and within its own household.

Three petty felons have a documentary made about their life in a trailer park.
The further adventures in time and space of the alien adventurer known as the Doctor and their companions from planet Earth.

column2: From the Earth to the Moon
column7: Dramatized portrayal of the Apollo manned space program.
Betrayed by his trusted friends and the woman he loved, Ömer Uçar returns as Ezel to exact his vengeance.
Philip J. Fry, a pizza delivery boy, is accidentally frozen in 1999 and thawed out on New Year's Eve 2999.

In the era of Japan's Meiji Restoration, an assassin regains his humanity.
A psychic middle school boy tries to live a normal life and keep his growing powers under control, even though he constantly gets into trouble.

A Rolling Stone reporter, embedded with The 1st Recon Marines chronicles his experiences during the first wave of the American-led assault on Baghdad in 2003.
A foul-mouthed nerd reviews bad video games.

In an effort to bring justice to the YouTube community, former police officer Ian Carter takes on the title of "Content Cop". Using his old police uniform and raw wit, Ian sets out to stop t... Read all

A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart.
